cause.description:
Sarcoma is a cancer that infects the tissue in our bodies. Because it occurs in tissue it can easily spread all over our bodies. There is very little research for this form of cancer due to how rare it is. However sarcoma cancer kills thousands of Americans each year.
1. We must find a cure to this form of cancer
cause.mission: Provide more research for this rare form of cancer
cause.name: Jennifer Hunter Yates Sarcoma Foundation
